babel-desc: A̠ mbeang #babel kyangta̠m wa̠i a ghwon ghwut ma̠ng a̠kwati-a̠tyuta̠m babila ka di̠ mi̠n tyimbwak ma̠ng cet mbeang a̠yaatemplet jhyi a̠gwam
babel-autocreate-reason: Á̠ shyia̠ di̠ khwuk peji sa [[$1|Babila]] hu di̠ mi̠n tyimbwak.
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Á̠nienta̠m mi̠ sot jini tyaat nyia̠ ba̠ byia̠ lyenta̠m shi $1 mat a̠lyem $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Á̠nienta̠m mi̠ sot jini tyaat lyen kyang mba hu mami a̠lyem $1.
babel-0: A̠tyuta̠m wuni [[$1|nwai]] byia̠ lyen [[$2|$3]] (ku a̠ kwan di̠n fi̠k nji a̠wot ma̠ng vwan a̠khwu ma̠ a̠da̠dei).
babel-1: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|a̠tsan]] si̠ [[$2|$3]] ji.
babel-2: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|a̠tyia̠ka̠]] si̠ [[$2|$3]] ji.
babel-3: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|á̠zanson]] si̠ [[$2|$3]] ji.
babel-4: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|kpa̠mkpaan a̠tyulyiat byina̠byin]] si̠ [[$2|$3]] ji.
babel-5: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|a̠gwak]] si̠ [[$2|$3]] ji.
babel-0-n: A̠tyuta̠m wuni [[$1|nwai]] byia̠ lyen [[$2|Shong]] (ku a̠ kwan di̠n fi̠k nji a̠wot ma̠ng vwan a̠khwu ma̠ a̠da̠dei).
babel-1-n: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|a̠tsan]] si̠ [[$2|Shong]] ji.
babel-2-n: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|a̠tyia̠ka̠u]] si̠ [[$2|Shong]] ji.
babel-3-n: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|á̠zanson]] si̠ [[$2|Shong]] ji.
babel-4-n: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|kpa̠mkpaan a̠tyulyiat byina̠byin]] si̠ [[$2|Shong]] ji.
babel-5-n: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ lyen [[$1|a̠gwak]] si̠ [[$2|Shong]] ji.
babel-N-n: A̠tyuta̠m wuni byia̠ fi̠k [[$1|byina̠byin]] si̠ [[$2|Shong]] ji.
